title: 有没有插件可以设置世界只能放置/破坏制定方块
author: li1526219648
txt_content: 如题，如果有比较骚的操作也可以，要求支持kc1.7.10

replies.author: GapCold
replies.txt_content:
那就来点骚操作
skript
脚本如下
on place:
    world is 世界名
    block is not 方块ID
    cancel event
on break:
    world is 世界名
    block is not 方块ID
    cancel event
把以上代码写入一个txt文档，然后把文档改名成 XXXX（任意英文）.sk
安装skript插件,然后把该文件放到skript的script文件夹中，然后游戏中输入/sk reload XXXX即可
有啥问题可以继续追问
没问题请采纳

replies.author: li1526219648
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 li1526219648 于 2018-7-18 18:11 编辑 
GapCold 发表于 2018-7-18 17:15
那就来点骚操作
skript
脚本如下
on place:
    world is lmqd
    block is not 5443
    cancel event
on break:
    world is lmqd
    block is not 5443
    cancel event


[18:03:22 INFO]: [Skript] Reloading break.sk...
[18:03:22 ERROR]: 'lmqd' is not an entity type (break.sk, line 2: world is lmqd')
[18:03:22 ERROR]: 'not 5443' is not an entity type (break.sk, line 3: block is not 5443')
[18:03:22 ERROR]: 'lmqd' is not an entity type (break.sk, line 6: world is lmqd')
[18:03:22 ERROR]: 'not 5443' is not an entity type (break.sk, line 7: block is not 5443')
[18:03:22 INFO]: [Skript] Encountered 4 errors while reloading break.sk!

所有地图都不可以破坏了。。。id5443的方块也不能放置

replies.author: GapCold
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 GapCold 于 2018-7-18 18:46 编辑 
li1526219648 发表于 2018-7-18 18:04
on place:
    world is lmqd
    block is not 5443
抱歉。世界名要加双引号而且ID前面加个a
也就是 is not a ID

replies.author: GapCold
replies.txt_content:
而且banitem插件也是可以做到的
先配置世界继承。然后
/banitem add w:世界名 c:false f:break

replies.author: li1526219648
replies.txt_content:
GapCold 发表于 2018-7-18 18:44
抱歉。世界名要加双引号而且ID前面加个a
也就是 is not a ID
[18:54:05 ERROR]: 'lmqd' is not an entity type (break.sk, line 3: world is lmqd')

replies.author: GapCold
replies.txt_content:
li1526219648 发表于 2018-7-18 18:56
[18:54:05 ERROR]: 'lmqd' is not an entity type (break.sk, line 3: world is lmqd')
说了世界名要加双引号，双双双引号
world is "lmqd"

replies.author: li1526219648
replies.txt_content:
GapCold 发表于 2018-7-18 18:48
而且banitem插件也是可以做到的
先配置世界继承。然后
/banitem add w:世界名 c:false f:break ...
哪个skript不支持我那个mod物品，然后banitem好像只能设置 "禁止破坏/放置xxx"，不能设置“只允许破坏/放置xxx”
